Ruann Coleman bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya, nke nwere ihe ndị e nwetara site na junkyards ma ọ bụ sitere na gburugburu ebe obibi, na Cape Town, Johannesburg na Rome, Milan na Torino, Italy
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ijikwa ma ihe ndị dị ndụ na ihe ndị na-adịghị ahụkebe dị ka osisi, ígwè na iko iji gbanwee ọnọdụ ha.
Coleman gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị elu na Mahadum Stellenbosch, ebe ọ nwetara Master of Fine Arts n'afọ 2014
O gosipụtala ihe ngosi onwe ya na South Africa na Italy ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na-adịgide adịgide n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe n'oge mgbe ochie
Stellenbosch Outdoor Sculpture Trust makwaara ya nke nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta ọrụ maka ihe banyere Hiervandaan..../ Site ebe a.../ Ndisuka Public Sculpture Initiative.
